name: Spacyneer
description:
Help a Spacyneer is in trouble!
he fell from the space ship and is now in trouble he has a magnet with him and his crew mates threw huge magnet panels for him to grab, and he now has to maneuver correctly to get back to the space ship.

Controls:
Mouse - to look
MRight/MLeft - to change your state
R/Esc - to restart the current level

Credits:
Giffi - Coding / Art
ProJonyz - Levels
Deep-Fold - For his awesome planet generator
